docblock.description: PurchaseCardRequest.php
PurchaseCardRequest purchases a card using a user account.
Set up a new PurchaseCard request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Selection of which Tango Card Service API environment

tag.name: param
tag.description: The username to access User's registered Tango Card account

tag.name: param
tag.description: The password to access User's registered Tango Card account

tag.name: param
tag.description: The SKU of the card to purchase.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the card to buy in cents (example 500 = $5.00).

tag.name: param
tag.description: Determines if Tango Card Service will send an email with gift card information to recipient. Email gift card and return the card's details (true), or just return the card's details (false).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the recipient. Only necessary if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The email address of the recipient. Only necessary if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The gift message to send to the recipient. Only necessary if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the person giving the gift. Optional if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The Company identifier for which Email Template when sending Gift Card. Optional if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: One of the supplied arguments was not in the expected state.

tag.description: upon success, else False (non-PHPdoc)

ServiceResponseEnum.php
Enumeration of expected response types from Tango Card Service API.
Undefined response
Success.
Failure - Insufficient Funds.
Failure - Invalid Credentials
Failure - Invalid Input
Failure - Insufficient Inventory
Failure - Service System Error

docblock.description: PurchaseCardResponse.php

tag.name: var
tag.description: number of purchase.

tag.name: var
tag.description: reference to the aforementioned purchase.

tag.name: var
tag.description: number provided to the recipient to be used at redemption upon the www.tangocard.com site.

tag.name: var
tag.description: pin provided to the recipient used to validate provided Card number a redemption upon the www.tangocard.com site.

tag.name: var
tag.description: is the address of a web page on the World Wide Web. This URL can only be accessed through the email you received. It is a unique URL, meaning that it cannot be duplicated or altered.

tag.name: var
tag.description: on the retailer, some eGift Cards Challenge Key in order to be accessed; if that is the case you will find it next to your link or URL. You will be prompted to input your Challenge Key when you try to open your eGift Card.

tag.name: var
tag.description: on the retailer,

docblock.description: Get the reference order id.
docblock.long-description: This id can be used (by Tango Card) to look up the order at a later date.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The reference order id.

docblock.description: Get the card's token.
docblock.long-description: This token can be used (by Tango Card) to look up a card at a later date.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The card's token.

docblock.description: Get the card's number (if available).

tag.name: return
tag.description: The card's number or null. This will only be set if the original request had tcSend set to false.

docblock.description: Get the card's pin (if available).

tag.name: return
tag.description: The card's pin or null. This will only be set if the original request had tcSend set to false and the card type requires a pin.

docblock.description: Get the card's claim URL (if available).
Get the card's challenge key (if available).
Get the card's event number (if available).

docblock.description: Get the available Tango Card account balance for provided authentication (username and password)

tag.name: param
tag.description: The username to access User's registered Tango Card account

tag.name: param
tag.description: The password to access User's registered Tango Card account

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns true upon success, else false.

docblock.description: Based upon available funds within authenticated user's Tango Card account, purchase a gift card for a specific recipient.
docblock.long-description:
How it is delivered is determined by how parameter 'tcSend' is set; if 'true', then the Tango Card Service will email a digital gift card to recipient's provided email address 'recipientEmail'; else user of this SDK is responsible.

Upon successful purchase, Tango Card Service will respond with confirmation information.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The username to access User's registered Tango Card account

tag.name: param
tag.description: The password to access User's registered Tango Card account

tag.name: param
tag.description: The SKU of the card to purchase.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The value of the card to buy in cents (example 500 = $5.00).

tag.name: param
tag.description: Determines if Tango Card Service will send an email with gift card information to recipient. Email gift card and return the card's details (true), or just return the card's details (false).

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the recipient. Only necessary if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The email address of the recipient. Only necessary if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The gift message to send to the recipient. Only necessary if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the person giving the gift. Optional if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The Company identifier for which Email Template to use when sending Gift Card. Optional if tcSend = true. If tcSend = false, then this input will be ignored.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns true upon success, else false.

docblock.description: TangoCardSdkAutoloader.php, autoloading class file locations hierarchy by supplying it with a function to run.
Tango Card SDK Autoloader Class
Constructor
docblock.long-description: When using spl_autoload_register() with class methods, it might seem that it can use only public methods, though it can use private/protected methods as well, if registered from inside the class.

docblock.description: This function will handle the autoloading of the TangoCard namespaced classes.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the class (with prepended namespace) to load.
